education.name: Information Technology Institute (ITI)
education.info: I learned more about mobile app development and gained valuable knowledge and skills during the 9-month diploma program. I focused on data structures, design patterns, and RESTful WebService basics, and used Kotlin, and Java to build several mobile projects throughout the program.

projects.name: Weather App
